text.p: Performance Nutrition Inc said Wednesday that under written consents signed by a majority of its shareholders, it removed Gary Lewellyn as the company's chairman, chief executive officer and president.
The company also removed Tamara Halling as its secretary and treasurer.

Performance Nutrition said it has elected Anthony Roth as its new chief executive officer and president, and David Wynne was appointed as its new secretary. The company expanded its board from five to eleven members.

Performance Nutrition's new management has initiated an investigation into the conduct of prior management and the accuracy of the its financial statements for the fiscal year ended September 30, 1995 and for the nine month period ended June 30, 1996, it said.
